article.title: Judge says FTC investigation into Media Matters ‘should alarm all Americans’
article.content: A federal judge has blocked the FTC's investigation into Media Matters research around advertising and antisemitic content on X.

🎯📈 Judge halts FTC probe into Media Matters after X lawsuit. Ruling raises concerns about government overreach & chills free speech. #AI #Tech #FreeSpeech #FTC

🔗 https://techcrunch.com/2025/08/16/judge-says-ftc-investigation-into-media-matters-should-alarm-all-americans/

article.title: Dead Take’s best scares come from real-life performances
article.content: Dead Take, the second game from Tales of Kenzera: Zau developer Surgent Studios, is a quiet horror game where the monster is ambition and the lengths a person will go for stardom. Like a lot of horror games, Dead Take relies on jumpscares to get the heart pumping. But playing this game, my deepest, most […]

tweet_data.tweet:
⚡🔍 Surgent Studios' Dead Take uses live-motion-captured actors, not CGI, for its monsters. Real human performances drive the horror, making ambition the true ter... #AI #Tech #DeadTake #HorrorGame

🔗 https://www.theverge.com/games/760213/dead-take-review-fmv-horror-game-ben-starr

analysis.innovation: Real actors’ live-motion-captured performances replace CGI monsters, turning human ambition—not supernatural horror—into the game’s chilling antagonist.

article.title: A brazen attack on air safety is underway — here’s what’s at stake
article.content: At the end of July, the National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) convened a three-day public hearing to investigate January's mid-air collision over Washington, DC that killed 67 people. After the hearing, two conclusions were inescapable. First, the disaster should have been prevented by existing safety rules. And second, the government regulators responsible for air safety […]
